name: Minor Health Potion
description: A simple red potion that restores health.
plaggCommentary: Tastes terrible! Not like cheese at all. But it works, I guess.

name: Minor Mana Potion
description: A blue potion that restores magical energy.
plaggCommentary: Fizzy! Like cheese soda. Wait, that's a terrible idea...

name: Greater Health Potion
description: A potent healing elixir with enhanced restorative properties.
plaggCommentary: Much better! Though still not cheese-flavored...

plaggCommentary: NOW WE'RE TALKING! The ultimate healing item! *chef's kiss*

name: Elixir of Rebirth

plaggCommentary: Death-defying! Though I'd rather defy a world without cheese.
